About the Company: Himalya International Ltd offer a variety of mushrooms like White (Agaricus), Crimini (Italian Brown) and Portobello as frozen Buttons, Slices, Dices & de-stemmed Caps. Mushrooms are grown in-house right from composting agro waste and developing spawn to quick processing within hours of picking.Most recently the company has ventured to cover the pure buffalo milk from India, with traditional Italian knowledge of making the real, authentic Mozzarella & Ricotta Cheeses under an Italian expert Raffaele Cioffi.Ethnic sweets and appetizers fall under the companys prepared food line.The company has also created partnerships with local farmers to produce all their raw material requirements from vegetables to pure buffalo milk.
